subject: Baseball
College Athletics
College World Series
lead_paragraph: The No. 9 batter Derek Campbell drove in two runs, closer Matt Flemer pitched three scoreless innings, and California extended its improbable season, beating Texas A&M, 7-3.
snippet: The No. 9 batter Derek Campbell drove in two runs, closer Matt Flemer pitched three scoreless innings, and California extended its improbable season, beating Texas A&M, 7-3.
